0000 1011	0000	load 11
0011 0000	0001	out
0001 1100	0010	add 12
0011 0000	0011	out
0010 1101	0100	sub 13
0011 0000	0101	out
0000 1110	0110	load 14
0001 1111	0111	add 15
0011 0000	1000	out
1111 0000	1001	halt

1000 0011	1011    11 has 131
0111 0000	1100	12 has 112	
1111 1111	1101	13 has 255
1111 1111	1110	14 has 255
1101 0110	1111	15 has 214

result should be -12
result should be 469

Please use Proteus 8.12 or later versions.
